entry.title: An Introduction to Gradient Flows in Metric Spaces

link.title: An Introduction to Gradient Flows in Metric Spaces

entry.content:
In this post, I’ll sketch how gradient flows can be extended beyond Hilbert spaces…

\[\frac{d}{dt} \mu_t + \nabla \cdot \left( \mu_t \nabla \frac{\delta \mathcal{F}}{\delta \mu} \right) = 0\]
entry.summary: In this post, I’ll sketch how gradient flows can be extended beyond Hilbert spaces…
